title: Certification required
context: [ยง457A-6] Certification required. Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, no person shall: (1) Represent one&rsquo;s self as a certified nurse aide; (2) Imply, in any manner, that one&rsquo;s self is a certified nurse aide; or (3) Use the abbreviation &ldquo;C.N.A.&rdquo; or any other words, letters, signs, or devices to identify one&rsquo;s self as a certified nurse aide; without having first obtained certification as provided in this chapter. [L 2007, c 226, pt of ยง4]
